user_query: I want to get the details of the German league 'Bundesliga' for the year 2021, focusing on the top scorers and their respective teams including their goals and assists.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the Bundesliga 2021 season data including match statistics.
Extract the top scorers from the retrieved Bundesliga data.
For each top scorer, get their respective team details.
Compile the goals and assists statistics for each top scorer.
